mapper.select: SELECT CODE, UPPER_CODE, NAME FROM DOC_CATEGORY START WITH UPPER_CODE IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CODE = UPPER_CODE ORDER BY SIBLINGS BY CODE

SELECT A.DOC_IDX,A.TITLE, B.NAME, TO_CHAR(A.WRITE_DATE,'MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, A.VIEW_COUNT, A.CATEGORY FROM DOC_SUMMARY A INNER JOIN USER B ON A.WRITER = B.USERNAME
WHERE CATEGORY = #{categoryCode}

SELECT A.DOC_IDX, A.TITLE, B.DETAIL, C.NAME, TO_CHAR(A.WRITE_DATE,'MM-DD') AS WRITE_DATE, A.VIEW_COUNT FROM DOC_SUMMARY A INNER JOIN DOC_DETAIL B ON A.DOC_IDX = B.DOC_IDX INNER JOIN USER C ON A.WRITER = C.USERNAME WHERE A.DOC_IDX = #{docIdx}
